settings.title: How long will one bottle last?
settings.content: One of our 50ml bottles will last around 2-3 months if used once a day.

settings.title: Are your fragrances vegan?
settings.content: Yes, all of our ingredients are vegan and no animal testing takes place. You can view our ingredients here.

settings.title: Do your perfumes have good staying power?
settings.content: Yes, all of our perfumes are 30% concentration (extrait de parfum) and quite often out perfume the majority of store bought fragrances.

settings.title: What is the different between EDT, EDP and Extrait?
settings.content: EDT has anywhere from 5-15% oil concenration, EDP has a 15-20% concentration and extrait has 30%+ - all of Whifs perfumes are extrait.

settings.title: What's the best way to store my fragrances?
settings.content: We recommend storing your fragrance in its original box and in a dark and cool (room temperature) location.

settings.title: How can I make my fragrances last longer?
settings.content:
We recommend a few sprays on your pulse points (wrists, behind ears, throat, behind knees, inner elbow).

Applying straight after your shower will give you the best results, you may also apply moisturiser before your perfume to increase longevity.

settings.title: Do your fragrances have a shelf life?
settings.content: We recommend using our fragrances within a 36 month (3 year) period. However, they may last much longer.

settings.title: How can I track my delivery?
settings.content: You will be provided tracking information via email. You will be able to tracking your shipment using your tracking number and visiting the Australia Post website here.

settings.title: How much does postage cost?
settings.content: Our postage is $10 Australia wide for standard or $15 for express. We offer FREE postage when you purchase 3+ bottles.

settings.title: How long will shipping take?
settings.content: Standard is approximately 3-6 business days and Express is 1-3 business days.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content: We have a "try, then decide" policy. This means you can try our full size perfume bottle, give it a couple of sprays when you receive it and if you don't like it you can return it through our super easy returns portal here. You have 30 days to return your purchase.

settings.title: How do I initiate a return?
settings.content: Please use your returns portal by clicking here.

settings.title: What if my product arrives damaged or is incorrect?
settings.content: If you receive a damaged item or the incorrect item, please contact us here.
